text: 4:15 Rom 3:20; 5:13; 5:20; 7:8; 2 Korin 3:7-9; Galesia 3:10; 3:19E kamaghɨn fo, Moses Osirizir Araziba itima gumazamiziba dar gɨn zuir puvatɨzɨma bizir kam God gamima a men anɨngazi. Moses Osirizir Araziba puvatɨghtɨma, e kamaghɨn mɨkɨman kogham, gumazamiziba Moses Osirizir Arazibar akaba batosi.
